content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal. I would like to consider it, but I am looking for a higher rental price. May I ask what your reasoning is for this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine: The apartment is located in the city center and has a great view of the city. The apartment is also very well-maintained and has all modern amenities. I believe the price is fair based on these factors.

What is your proposed rental price?
name: Bo Li

content: While I appreciate the location and amenities of the apartment, I am looking for a rental price that better reflects the value of the property. Based on my research and market analysis, I propose a rental price of 1,000 Euros per month. This price takes into account the desirable location and the modern amenities of the apartment, as well as the current market rates for similar properties in the area.
name: Heinrich Heine
